snippet: Despite an overtime loss, the Devils outshot the Kings and exhibited why they may be the most successful, best-run sports franchise in the New York area.
abstract: Charles McGrath On Hockey column asserts that the New Jersey Devils, despite falling behind 2-0 in the Stanley Cup finals against the Los Angeles Kings, have been the most successful, best-run sports franchise in the New York area for the past 25 years.
lead_paragraph: Despite an overtime loss, the Devils outshot the Kings and exhibited why they may be the most successful, best-run sports franchise in the New York area.

headline.seo: Trailing in the Stanley Cup, Devils Remain Ahead of the Game
headline.main: Trailing in the Finals, but Remaining Ahead of the Game
headline.print_headline: Trailing in the Finals, But Remaining Ahead of the Game
